00022 #ifndef HYPERSPACE_CLIENTCONNECTIONHANDLER_H
00023 #define HYPERSPACE_CLIENTCONNECTIONHANDLER_H

00025 #include <boost/thread/mutex.hpp>

00029 #include "AsyncComm/Comm.h"
00030 #include "AsyncComm/DispatchHandler.h"
00031 
00032 
00033 namespace Hyperspace {
00034 
00035   using namespace Hypertable;
00036 
00037   class Session;
00038 
00039   class ClientConnectionHandler : public DispatchHandler {
00040   public:
00041 
00042     enum { DISCONNECTED, CONNECTING, HANDSHAKING, CONNECTED };
00043 
00044     ClientConnectionHandler(Comm *comm, Session *session, uint32_t timeout_ms);
00045     virtual ~ClientConnectionHandler();
00046 
00047     virtual void handle(Hypertable::EventPtr &event_ptr);
00048 
00049     void set_session_id(uint64_t id) { m_session_id = id; }
00050 
00051     bool disconnected() {
00052       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00053       return m_state == DISCONNECTED;
00054     }
00055 
00056     int initiate_connection(struct sockaddr_in &addr) {
00057       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00058       DispatchHandlerPtr dhp(this);
00059       m_state = CONNECTING;
00060       int error = m_comm->connect(addr, dhp);
00061 
00062       if (error == Error::COMM_ALREADY_CONNECTED) {
00063         HT_WARNF("Connection attempt to Hyperspace.Master "
00064                  "at %s - %s", InetAddr::format(addr).c_str(),
00065                  Error::get_text(error));
00066         error = Error::OK;
00067       }
00068 
00069       if (error != Error::OK) {
00070         HT_ERRORF("Problem establishing TCP connection with Hyperspace.Master "
00071                   "at %s - %s", InetAddr::format(addr).c_str(),
00072                   Error::get_text(error));
00073         m_comm->close_socket(addr);
00074         m_state = DISCONNECTED;
00075       }
00076 
00077       return error;
00078     }
00079 
00080     void set_verbose_mode(bool verbose) { m_verbose = verbose; }
00081 
00082     void close() {
00083       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00084       m_comm->close_socket(m_master_addr);
00085       m_state = DISCONNECTED;
00086     }
00087 
00088   private:
00089     Mutex        m_mutex;
00090     Comm *m_comm;
00091     Session *m_session;
00092     uint64_t m_session_id;
00093     int m_state;
00094     bool m_verbose;
00095     struct sockaddr_in m_master_addr;
00096     uint32_t m_timeout_ms;
00097   };
00098 
00099   typedef intrusive_ptr<ClientConnectionHandler> ClientConnectionHandlerPtr;
00100 
00101 } // namespace Hypertable
